name: Dream Bright
description:
Search, dream, and sneak to retrieve all of Lucy’s toys with the help of her imaginary friend.
Dream Bright offers a refreshing variety by going through 3 cycles each phase.

  • Explore the large house in search of Lucy's toys
  • Dream to reach your toy through some enjoyable platforming sections
  • Sneak through the night and retrieve your toys by avoiding the monsters lurking around the corner



Moving into a new house can feel like a maze.
Help Lucy solve puzzles that block her path.
Vault, drag, and crouch through her house to discover her toys.



Dreaming makes you feel floaty and powerful!
Traverse Lucy's dreams together with her companion.
Dash and jump through her magical world to approach her toys.



When night falls, the monsters awake.
Inanimate objects gain life but will try to take yours.
Retrieve Lucy's toys as demons patrol through the house.


This game is made by 6 students from Howest - Digital Arts & Entertainment in the 3rd year of their bachelor.
